title: SGC t206s Jennings, Bresnahan, D. Taylor

posts.post_title: SGC t206s Jennings, Bresnahan, D. Taylor
posts.post_content:
I have the following cards available for sale:
1) t206 Frank Bowerman Sweet Caporal SGC 50/4 SOLD
2) t206 Fred Parent Sweet Caporal SGC 50/4 $50
3) t206 Bugs Raymond Sweet Caporal SGC 50/4 $50
4) t206 Dummy Taylor Sweet Caporal SGC 50/4 SOLD
5) t206 Lou Ritter Sweet Caporal SGC 60/5 $75
6) t206 Cy Seymour Sweet Caporal SGC 60/5 $75
7) t206 Roger Bresnahan (Portrait) El Principe De Gales SGC 40/3 SOLD
8) t206 Hughie Jennings (One Hand) Piedmont SGC 60/5 $240
Prices include shipping, paypal fees, etc.  Contact me if you have questions.  I will be able to provide scans tomorrow night.  Thanks!
Jim

Piedmont150,
Sorry the Bresnahan sold to Dustan.  Thanks for your interest!
Jim
